## Describe the bug
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

## Steps to reproduce
1. Go to '...'
2. Run '...'
3. See error

## Expected behavior
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

## Screenshots or logs
If applicable, add screenshots or logs to help explain your problem. Please do **not** include real PHI.

## Environment
- OS: [e.g. macOS 14]
- Node.js version: [e.g. 18.18.0]
- Package version: [e.g. 0.1.0]

Add any other context about the problem here.
